name: Fierna Tiefling
description: Descended from Fierna, a powerful archdevil who rules Phlegethos, the fourth layer of the Nine Hells, these tieflings are known for their silver tongues.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Hellish Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Legacy of Phlegethos
traits.description: You know the Friends cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast Charm Person once as a 2nd-level spell. At 5th level, you can cast Suggestion once. You must finish a long rest to cast these spells again with this trait.
